Package it.polimi.ingsw.Server

Class SocketClientConnection

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Observer.Observable<Message>
it.polimi.ingsw.Server.SocketClientConnection
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientConnection, java.lang.Runnable
public class SocketClientConnection
extends Observable<Message>
implements ClientConnection, java.lang.Runnable
A SocketClientConnection is used by Server to handle the Client connection.

    void closeConnection()
    Used to deregister connection from Session and to close Socket (if the Game ends and/or the Client has a network error)

    • send

      public void send​(java.lang.Object message)
      Used to send an Object on the outpuStream of the Server socket, linked to an unique Client because each SocketClientConnection has a private ObjectOutputStream.
      Specified by:
      send in interface ClientConnection
      Parameters:
      message -

    • run

      public void run()
      used to receive messages asynchronously on a ObjectInputStream. Each SocketClientConnection has a private ObjectInputStream which communicate with an OutputStream of a Client. This method acts differently based on the Message read. If there are connection errors the Socket will be closed. Can receive PlayerRetrieveSessions, PlayerCreateSessionMessage, PlayerSelectSession and messages that handle player moves.
      Specified by:
      run in interface java.lang.Runnable

    • isEmptyInput

      private boolean isEmptyInput​(java.lang.String input)
